title: 좋아요”
content: 방이 많이 어두운거 말곤 다 좋아요. 위치가 최적이고, 공항근처라 잠만 자려고 했는데 저~~엉말 깔끔하고, 조식 퀄리티도 넘 좋아요. 수영장도 써보고싶었는데, 시간 없어서 못들어가봐서 참 아쉬워요

title: 공항 바로앞”
content:
위치는 좋아요
방 청소가 안된곳을 줘서 실망했고요
티비 리모컨도 안되는곳을 줘서
컴플레인 하기도 귀찮아서 그냥 썼습니다

title: 시차 적응 위해 하루 투숙함”
content: 공항에서 걸어서 10분 내외 찾아가는게 어렵진않지만 멕시코 신호등이 없어 매우 당황 한화 20만원 방인데 물하나 주고 잠만잘수있는 방이었네요 레스토랑 음식은 생각보다 그냥저냥이었는데 저렴하진 않았어요

title: 공항근처 1박하기 좋아요”
content: 호텔존에서 올인클루시브 즐기고 다음날 공항 갈때 1박 하기 딱 좋은 호텔, 셔틀이 있어서 편했음

hotel_name: 호텔 루마 바이 카비아 (Hotel Luma by Kavia)
title: 不错的酒店”
content: 我是一个高档酒店的常客。这次入住，主要是第一次到坎昆，且想对坎昆市中心有一定了解。因为想参加当地一日游观光，所以没有直接住宿坎昆酒店区，而选择了这家酒店。应该说，总体还是不错的。房间挺大，没有浴缸，只有淋雨。淋浴间和马桶间是分开的，相当于有2个隔间，当中是盥洗台，水也挺大。空调挺足。因为地坪是地砖，比较好打理，所以感觉挺干净。坎昆市区几乎没有高档酒店，高档酒店全在海滩边的酒店区。这家酒店临近ADO Centro（机场快线中心），这个中心还有去Tulum等其他旅游地点的大巴。这个酒店周边有不少餐饮，临近还有一家中国餐厅。周边不远还有沃尔玛和当地一家大型超市。去海滩酒店区主要乘坐R1和R2公交车，公交车比较落后，类似国内90年代的车辆，没有空调。但是ADO机场线和各旅游区的大巴非常不错，与国内大巴相似，空调很足，乘坐这样的大巴需要披一件外套。公交车没有空调无所谓，10-次年4月，坎昆的基本温度都在28摄氏度以下，特别是晚上很凉快。说说这家缺点：没有热水壶（这里几乎都没有）、只有浴巾（没有其他）、所有一次性物品都需要自备（除了洗澡的洗发液和沐浴露、润肤露），没有一次性拖鞋，所以，这方面需要全部自备，或者去附件大超市购买。这里的消费不低，美国和加拿大的消费水平。当地只有美元、欧元和加币可以兑换当地比索，人民币不收（除非银行，银行晚上和双休日关闭）。如果参加当地一日游，或者市区观光（2天足以），可以住这家酒店。主要是房间大，空调还可以。晚间比较吵闹，附近有迪厅。有睡眠障碍的，谨慎选择。如果不参加市中心观光和一日游，建议住酒店区，酒店区的酒店价格和当地消费一样，非常贵。

hotel_name: 호텔 루마 바이 카비아 (Hotel Luma by Kavia)
title: 보통”
content: El hotel no tiene buena insolación y se escucha en la habitación cualquier ruido desde la recepción o cuando gente esta hablando en los pasillos. un poco costoso para lo que es.

hotel_name: 호텔 루마 바이 카비아 (Hotel Luma by Kavia)
title: Creí era mejor. No lo recomiendo ”
content:
Hay mejores hoteles por un poco más. Le doy un 6.9
No volveria

title: Completely No Value”
content: We stayed 3 nights. The room was completely not same as what they posted. The first room was like a storage, so I went to the front desk at 1AM to discuss upgrading our room. The description from the staff for another room was not same as what he explained. So, I came back to the front desk, and asked another room . The Julio who is the front desk staff  helping us get rooms is completely not useful.  I regret to choose this hotel for honeymoon.

title: 아주아주 좋아요”
content: 2박 3일 보냈는데요. 환경보호를 위해 시트교체나 수건교체는 원하는 고객에게만 신청받아서 진행하더라고요. 저희는 연박 하는 동안 그냥 처음 제공한 수건이랑 시트 썼어요. 저희는 조식이나 다른 것들 포함 안된 기본으로 묵었는데 그래도 수영장이나 호텔 앞 수영장도 다 사용할 수 있어요. 숙소 안에 작은 마켓도 있어서 좋았습니다. 직원분들도 너무너무 친절하시고 칸쿤에 있는 동안 최고 힐링이었던 시간이었습니다~!

hotel_name: TRS 코럴 호텔 - 성인 전용 - 올 인클루시브 (TRS Coral Hotel - Adults Only - All Inclusive)
title: 고급지고 호캉스로 딱”
content:
레스토랑이 전부 오픈하는게 아니라 아쉽지만 퀄리티 좋고 고급져요
호텔 위치때문인지 침구류가 눅눅한게 아쉬워요
돈 낸 만큼 대접받는 호텔
추가금 낼수록 대접 받을 수 있어요

hotel_name: TRS 코럴 호텔 - 성인 전용 - 올 인클루시브 (TRS Coral Hotel - Adults Only - All Inclusive)
title: 올인클루시브 가성비”
content: 호텔존보다 바다 조망은 아쉬우나, 그랜드 팔라디움까지 이용할 수 있어 다양한 레스토랑 이용 및 호텔 인프라 등 쾌적하게 지낼 수 있었음. 아쉬운건 수영장이 다를 곳에 비해 작았다

hotel_name: TRS 코럴 호텔 - 성인 전용 - 올 인클루시브 (TRS Coral Hotel - Adults Only - All Inclusive)
title: 호텔은 크고 좋음 그러나”
content:
호텔은 매우 크고 좋다.
룸서비스도 빠르고 이용가능 한 식당이 많아서 식사를 선택해서 먹을 수 있어 음식이 질리지 않았다. 그러나
개인수영장에 있는 카바나가 더러웠다.

hotel_name: TRS 코럴 호텔 - 성인 전용 - 올 인클루시브 (TRS Coral Hotel - Adults Only - All Inclusive)
title: 칸쿤내 리조트 중 훌륭합니다”
content: 지역은 다소 떨어져있고, 바다가 호텔존에 비해 예쁘지는 않지만 리조트 전반적으로 고요하고, 그랜드팔라디움 시설도 이용할 수있어서 좋습니다ㅎㅎ 또한 레스토랑도 모두 훌륭합니다 특히 라보헴이요

hotel_name: TRS 코럴 호텔 - 성인 전용 - 올 인클루시브 (TRS Coral Hotel - Adults Only - All Inclusive)
title: 비싸긴하지만 잘쉬고옴”
content:
직원들 친절하고 레스토랑도 다양하고 수영장도 좋고
좋습니다. 
다만 부분 파손된 시설로 불편함이 있었습니다.
추천하는 이용방법은 저렴한 방을 예약 후 스파를 아용하고 인피니티 풀을 사용하는겁니다 ^^

hotel_name: TRS 코럴 호텔 - 성인 전용 - 올 인클루시브 (TRS Coral Hotel - Adults Only - All Inclusive)
title: 최고의 휴식처”
content:
신혼여행으로 방문했는데, 휴양그자체입니다
버틀러와 메신저로 수시로 소통하기때문에
영어를 꼭 잘하지않더라도 
전혀 문제되지않고
올인크루시브는 말하지않아도 행복 그자체이지요

hotel_name: TRS 코럴 호텔 - 성인 전용 - 올 인클루시브 (TRS Coral Hotel - Adults Only - All Inclusive)
title: 최고였어요”
content:
거리가 좀 멀어서 힘들긴 한데
직원분들이 정말 정말 너무 친절하고
레스토랑 전부 다 가보진 못했지만
추천해준 곳인 스테이크랑 시푸드 하는곳 갔는데
대만족스러웠습니다.

수영장 완벽했고 디제이, 연주 최고였어요

근데 침실 침구가 좀 습해서 꿉꿉한게 조금 힘들었습니다ㅠ

hotel_name: TRS 코럴 호텔 - 성인 전용 - 올 인클루시브 (TRS Coral Hotel - Adults Only - All Inclusive)
title: 생각보다 별로”
content:
시설이나 다른 부분에서는 분명히 좋지만, 개인 버틀러 서비스나 저녁을 매번 예약을 하는 부분은 나름 불편하고 이게 맞지 않은 경우라면 약간의
스트레스가 있음. 그리고 우리 버틀러는 단 한 번도 얼굴을 본 적이 없음

content: 호텔 컨디션이 너무 오래된거 같아요. 침구도 방도 꿉꿉하고 청소상태도 그닥 좋지 않습니다. 배딩이나 이런거 좀 싼티나요. 룸써나 리조트내 음식도 훌륭한 편도 아닙니다. 호텔이 엄청 컸고 성인 전용이라 좋았던거 빼고는 저는 다 그냥 그랬습니다.

title: 코르키를 찾으세요”
content:
버틀러가 졸라 친절했음. 스몰토크 싫어하는 내향인부부도 그런 친절한 분위기에 매우 만족할 정도임. 음식 맛있고 수영장 이쁜거는 아마 다른 리뷰로 충분하겠지만 이 호텔의 장점은 플로어마다 있는 버틀러가 친절했다는 것임.
스칼렛 아르떼도 갔다왔는데 그곳은 시설이나 전경이 훨씬 더 좋았지만 개인적으로 코랄의 서비스가 더 기억에 많이 남았음.
혹시 버틀러를 지정하거나 층을 바꿀수 있다면 코르헤? 코르키?가 매우 친절했던것만 기억하면 될듯 굳굳 아주 좋음

title: 전체적으로 만족스러운 여행이었습니다”
content:
스페인어가 안되서 좀 불편했고
식사는 전체적으로 만족스러웠습니다.

hotel_name: GR 카리베 바이 솔라리스, 디럭스 올 인클루시브 리조트 (GR Caribe By Solaris, Deluxe All Inclusive Resort)
title: 칸쿤 첫경험”
content:
머나먼 남미의 뜨거운 나라  멕시코에서도 세계적인 휴양지 칸쿤을 방문했다.
한마디로 죽기 전에 한번은 와봐야 하는 곳
먹을거리, 즐길거리, 마실거리, 볼거리가 풍부한 곳이다.
백문이 불여일견!

hotel_name: GR 카리베 바이 솔라리스, 디럭스 올 인클루시브 리조트 (GR Caribe By Solaris, Deluxe All Inclusive Resort)
title: 최악의 호텔”
content:
이런 호텔 또 없습니다.
객실 습하고 냄새 진동합니다. 투숙내내 시체와 함께 있는듯 축축합니다.
프론트 데스크 엉망에 아무도 책임있는 행동 안하고 서로 서로 미루기만 합니다. 큰소리로 싸워야 겨우 겨우 들어 주는척...
식당 음식 종류 비약합니다.. 맛은 가격대비??
한국분들 절대로 가지 마세요..전 멕시코 한국 영사 도움도 받고도 호텔측의 땡깡으로 휴가 5일을 날려 버렸습이다.
절대로 가지 않으시길...
이런 호텔 또 없습니다.
인종차별에 노티스도 없이 도어 락도 당했습니다..
예약하신분들 계시면 재고해 주세요..

hotel_name: GR 카리베 바이 솔라리스, 디럭스 올 인클루시브 리조트 (GR Caribe By Solaris, Deluxe All Inclusive Resort)
title: 가성비 최고예요”
content: 카리베 리조트만 놓고 보면 뭔가 좀 부족하지만 바로 옆에 솔라리스를 공용으로 사용할 수 있어서 너무 좋아요! 커플여행으로는 좀 그렇고 가족 여행으로 추천해요!!

hotel_name: GR 카리베 바이 솔라리스, 디럭스 올 인클루시브 리조트 (GR Caribe By Solaris, Deluxe All Inclusive Resort)
title: 가성비 좋은 호텔”
content:

title: 아치형의 곡선이 로맨틱한 호텔”
content: 어딜 가나 보이는 아치형의 곡선이 로맨틱한 분위기를 자아냅니다. 바로 옆의 Royal Solaris Cancun과 모든 시설을 공유합니다. 덕분에 쇼, 레스토랑, 수영장 등의 옵션이 다양합니다. 바로 앞에 정말 예쁜 바다를 보유한 호텔입니다. 음식은 맛있다기보다는 무난한 정도이며, 저녁 때 예약이 필요한 레스토랑을 미리 예약하고 꼭 이용하길 추천합니다. 개인적으로는 Veneto 레스토랑에서의 식사가 만족스러웠습다.

title: 전체적으로 만족스러운 여행이었습니다”
content:
스페인어가 안되서 좀 불편했고
식사는 전체적으로 만족스러웠습니다.

hotel_name: GR 카리베 바이 솔라리스, 디럭스 올 인클루시브 리조트 (GR Caribe By Solaris, Deluxe All Inclusive Resort)
title: 최악의 호텔”
content:
이런 호텔 또 없습니다.
객실 습하고 냄새 진동합니다. 투숙내내 시체와 함께 있는듯 축축합니다.
프론트 데스크 엉망에 아무도 책임있는 행동 안하고 서로 서로 미루기만 합니다. 큰소리로 싸워야 겨우 겨우 들어 주는척...
식당 음식 종류 비약합니다.. 맛은 가격대비??
한국분들 절대로 가지 마세요..전 멕시코 한국 영사 도움도 받고도 호텔측의 땡깡으로 휴가 5일을 날려 버렸습이다.
절대로 가지 않으시길...
이런 호텔 또 없습니다.
인종차별에 노티스도 없이 도어 락도 당했습니다..
예약하신분들 계시면 재고해 주세요..

content: 매우 깨끗하고 친절한 스태프입니다. 강력 추천합니다.

title: Do not respect reservation made.”
content: Made reservation for a "Standard" room (stated in Agoda voucher), which included minibar and microwave - according to webpage. They claimed I had a reservation for "Simple" room, and asked for $9usd more per day ($150 pesos) to include fridge.  Indicated it was Agoda's problem (I did not contact Agoda at the time because the previous time I had a problem they did nothing for several days). Assigned 'simple' room has updated bathroom, but old, worn out furniture.  AC and housekeeping were good.

title: 보통”
content:
Receptionist doesn’t communicate in English.
Most ignore your questions. Trying not helping you .

Construction behind wall with power impacted machine very noisy Staff explained is not them facility . Ignoring complaints.
Finally change room with lover category.

title: Tulum mayan monkey”
content: Very good value for the 12 bedroom dorm. Pay online not at the desk

title: Way too loud”
content:
Even earplugs won't help lol. Stay here if you're happy to sleep after 1am every night. I guess you get what you pay for. 
We were in a private room, which was quite spacious though. 
There is also no lift, so had to lug the suitcases up/down a few flights.

title: Epic”
content: Apart from losing all our wallets and phones due to excessive drinking and partying with amazing people and staff..,.... we had an Epic time at the Monkey 🐒  one that us and others around us will never forget.  Mind blowing experience...... I would definitely relive Mayan Monkey again.  No such thing as a bad experience.

title: Overrated Hostel”
content: Tulum is overrated to begin with and there's this hostel with overpriced drinks, claims of being a party hostel and terrible bar staff who demands for tips in exchange for serving what seems to me is an expensive alcohol free cocktail. Food looks good... for instagram tho😂 This hostel is NOISY! I'm alright with the music playing until 1am but the construction going on around is just loud.

title: good in Tulum”
content: Was there like two periods, before christmas and newyearseve`` week. Clear its bit expensiev but in between the hostels on Tulum is one of the bests. good party ambient that you can avoid easily. Nice kitchen and curtain hided comfortable beds. 2 bathroom each room. Quality price is one of best in tulum if you are not paying more than 350 pesos. Depending on the quantity of people would reach 2000 Pesos. Not bad

title: Very nice”
content: What to say, it's a perfect place for backpackers

title: Very good hostel”
content: It's an hostel and hotel at the same time, party vibes, full service on demand. Thumbs up!

title: Very nice all inclusive party hostel”
content: It's a new way to live the hostel, full service on demand, low accommodation price, party vibes.

title: EXCLENTE LUGAR”
content: Gran relación precios-calidad, excelnte servicio e infraestructura, se generan diferntes atmósferas en la diferentes áreas de las instalaciones.  Terraza de alberca, totalmente chillout, y área de terraza baja, muy buena para meditar, relajarse y trabajar. Bien por el concepto.

title: Buen servicio en relación calidad-precio”
content: Las personas que laboran ahí son muy amables y te orientan respecto a lugares y precios para mejorar tu experiencia en Tulum. Las habitaciones son frescas y las zonas comunes son muy amplias.

title: Revisa bien lo que has pagado”
content:
Tras haber pagado el impuesto y hacer el check in con una recepcionista quedó todo cerrado pero al volver a las 15:00 para el acceso a la habitación otro recepcionista me solicitó pagar de nuevo y tuve que cortarle en seco, se dío cuenta y enseguida me dijo que me harían descuentos especiales si queria alargar la estancia… 

El caso es que quise alargarla, y la jefa de recepción me trató mal y me hechó diciendo que la habitación la habia reservado en solo mujeres y que no tenian hab mixtas, e hizo que el seguridad viniese conmigo a la habitación a recoger mis cosas como si hubiese hecho algo malo, el caso es que me metí en la web a reservar mixta y si que tenían habitación libre de hecho varias.. simplemente se le cruzó el cable y me trató así, una pena porque el lugar está muy bien pero no volvería jamás.

title: Todo perfecto - Excepto la recepción”
content:
La Estructura es increíble, las zonas comunes parecen de un hotel. 
La posición está a mitad entre la playa y el centro de tulum, para moverte vas a necesitar una bicicleta, que puedes alquilar en en el mismo hostal por 220 pesos y varios sitios en la calle principal entre 150 y 250 pesos por las 24 horas.
El hostal tiene un bar y una piscina bastante grande con mucho sitio para tomar el sol, una sala común donde descansar, la cocina y una habitación para remote working. 
Las habitaciones son limpias y de calidad muy alta, con camas cómodas y grandes, mucho espacio y taquillas enormes para guardar tus cosas.
El único punto negativo es la recepción, los trabajadores son poco amables, muy fríos y poco dispuestos a ayudarte, si tienes alguna duda o necesitas informaciones de algún tipo, te contestan casi siempre que “no saben”, no es esto el espíritu de trabajar en un hostal!

content: Volveré, fue una buena experiencia 😊👍🏼

title: Todo perfecto - Excepto la recepción”
content:
La Estructura es increíble, las zonas comunes parecen de un hotel. 
La posición está a mitad entre la playa y el centro de tulum, para moverte vas a necesitar una bicicleta, que puedes alquilar en en el mismo hostal por 220 pesos y varios sitios en la calle principal entre 150 y 250 pesos por las 24 horas.
El hostal tiene un bar y una piscina bastante grande con mucho sitio para tomar el sol, una sala común donde descansar, la cocina y una habitación para remote working. 
Las habitaciones son limpias y de calidad muy alta, con camas cómodas y grandes, mucho espacio y taquillas enormes para guardar tus cosas.
El único punto negativo es la recepción, los trabajadores son poco amables, muy fríos y poco dispuestos a ayudarte, si tienes alguna duda o necesitas informaciones de algún tipo, te contestan casi siempre que “no saben”, no es esto el espíritu de trabajar en un hostal!

title: Lindo lugar ”
content: Volveré, fue una buena experiencia 😊👍🏼

title: Revisa bien lo que has pagado”
content:
Tras haber pagado el impuesto y hacer el check in con una recepcionista quedó todo cerrado pero al volver a las 15:00 para el acceso a la habitación otro recepcionista me solicitó pagar de nuevo y tuve que cortarle en seco, se dío cuenta y enseguida me dijo que me harían descuentos especiales si queria alargar la estancia… 

El caso es que quise alargarla, y la jefa de recepción me trató mal y me hechó diciendo que la habitación la habia reservado en solo mujeres y que no tenian hab mixtas, e hizo que el seguridad viniese conmigo a la habitación a recoger mis cosas como si hubiese hecho algo malo, el caso es que me metí en la web a reservar mixta y si que tenían habitación libre de hecho varias.. simplemente se le cruzó el cable y me trató así, una pena porque el lugar está muy bien pero no volvería jamás.

title: Overrated Hostel”
content: Tulum is overrated to begin with and there's this hostel with overpriced drinks, claims of being a party hostel and terrible bar staff who demands for tips in exchange for serving what seems to me is an expensive alcohol free cocktail. Food looks good... for instagram tho😂 This hostel is NOISY! I'm alright with the music playing until 1am but the construction going on around is just loud.

title: Way too loud”
content:
Even earplugs won't help lol. Stay here if you're happy to sleep after 1am every night. I guess you get what you pay for. 
We were in a private room, which was quite spacious though. 
There is also no lift, so had to lug the suitcases up/down a few flights.

title: good in Tulum”
content: Was there like two periods, before christmas and newyearseve`` week. Clear its bit expensiev but in between the hostels on Tulum is one of the bests. good party ambient that you can avoid easily. Nice kitchen and curtain hided comfortable beds. 2 bathroom each room. Quality price is one of best in tulum if you are not paying more than 350 pesos. Depending on the quantity of people would reach 2000 Pesos. Not bad

title: Modernes Hotel mit tollen Pools am Rand von Tulum”
content:
Wir waren 4 Nächte in dem Hotel und hatten ein Studio Apartment. Das Zimmer war sehr großzügig geschnitten, toll eingerichtet mit voll ausgestatteter Küche und privatem Whirlpool. Insgesamt ist die Anlage sehr modern mit schönen Pools.  Das Frühstück ist in Buffetform, einfach aber jeden Tag mit neuen Speisen. Der einzige (große) Nachteil ist die Lage des Hotels fernab von der „Innenstadt“ und auch dem Beach in Tulum. Wir hatten Fahrräder gemietet, empfehlenswert ist aber definitiv ein Auto.  Die Zubringerstraße hat viele Schlaglöcher und die Gegend ist arm. 

Insgesamt hatten wir einen tollen Aufenthalt und abgesehen von der Lage ist das Preis-Leistungsverhältnis für Tulum einzigartig.

title: Horrible service”
content: Had to ask for new towels and sheets for three days in a row before we got them, also they tried to charge over double what we owed when we checked out for the snacks in the room

title: Gorgeous Room/Terribly Loud”
content:
Now, I want to preface this by saying that literally everything was great about the room and the staff. The only issue was the noise. Because of how the building was constructed you can hear EVERYTHING. Everything people are doing in the floors above and below, everything they’re saying and laughing about in the reception. All the doors getting slammed shut. There’s even a bar or something next door just bumping music all night. Oh and the neighbors like to play the trumpet in the streets at night when they get drunk. 

No I know I sound like a Karen but I’ve been sleeping in party hostels for years and decided I wanted to go somewhere a little nicer so I could relax but I got pretty frustrated many times. You can’t sleep in after 8 because of hotel and street noise. And if you have a night where you’re trying to turn in before 11 then good luck. 

Also I will say, it could have just been my room and it’s location experiencing all these issues, maybe a room higher in the hotel would be quieter? I was in the second floor so I heard the street and bc of the open walkway layout, I heard everyone arriving and leaving through the entrance. 

But yea, I had no other issues with this hotel or the room. It’s gorgeous and the staff were very nice and accommodating.

title: Hotel war eine Baustelle”
content: Das Hotel war geschlossen und eine Baustelle, man hatte mich weg geschickt, obwohl ich sehr kurzfristig gebucht hatte. Also irgendwie ein Fehler, dass das Hotel noch buchbar war. In der Umgebung des Hotels sind eher zwielichtige Bars, daher hätte ich mich wahrscheinlich eh nicht wohl gefühlt

title: 우수”
content: El hotel está ubicado bastante bien, hay una avenida llena de restaurantes, bares, tiendas y comida callejera a unos 2 minutos andando. Tiene piscina en la azotea, es un sitio miy guay, nos quedamls varios días allí, no se suele llenar mucho de gente. Limpieza de habitación perfecta, se puede mejorar la limpieza de la piscina, ya que habían un montón de insectos dentro. Por las noches hay bastante ruido, ya que está situado justo al lado de 2 clubs de striptease. Nos faltó la calidez del personal de recepción.

All the doors getting slammed shut. There’s even a bar or something next door just bumping music all night. Oh and the neighbors like to play the trumpet in the streets at night when they get drunk. 

No I know I sound like a Karen but I’ve been sleeping in party hostels for years and decided I wanted to go somewhere a little nicer so I could relax but I got pretty frustrated many times. You can’t sleep in after 8 because of hotel and street noise. And if you have a night where you’re trying to turn in before 11 then good luck. 

Also I will say, it could have just been my room and it’s location experiencing all these issues, maybe a room higher in the hotel would be quieter? I was in the second floor so I heard the street and bc of the open walkway layout, I heard everyone arriving and leaving through the entrance. 

But yea, I had no other issues with this hotel or the room. It’s gorgeous and the staff were very nice and accommodating.

title: Hotel war eine Baustelle”
content: Das Hotel war geschlossen und eine Baustelle, man hatte mich weg geschickt, obwohl ich sehr kurzfristig gebucht hatte. Also irgendwie ein Fehler, dass das Hotel noch buchbar war. In der Umgebung des Hotels sind eher zwielichtige Bars, daher hätte ich mich wahrscheinlich eh nicht wohl gefühlt

title: 우수”
content: El hotel está ubicado bastante bien, hay una avenida llena de restaurantes, bares, tiendas y comida callejera a unos 2 minutos andando. Tiene piscina en la azotea, es un sitio miy guay, nos quedamls varios días allí, no se suele llenar mucho de gente. Limpieza de habitación perfecta, se puede mejorar la limpieza de la piscina, ya que habían un montón de insectos dentro. Por las noches hay bastante ruido, ya que está situado justo al lado de 2 clubs de striptease. Nos faltó la calidez del personal de recepción.

title: Lindo hotel”
content: Las instalaciones on buenas y tienen cocina, esta muy chevere el hotel

title: Amazing experience!”
content: It was a last minute decision that we visit Tulum and it was one of the best decision we made in Tulum. If you want the place quiet away from core town then this is the place! great pool up on the rooftop area we enjoyed and cannot skip their warm welcome from the reception and staff. Thank you for the warm accommodation! ps. the breakfast was tasteful as well!

title: A haven of tranquillity ”
content:
The most wonderful place to stay.
Everything was super amazing.
Location is great, inbetween the beach and Main Street, hire a bike, makes it easier.
Built around trees and an open central space, oozes peacefulness.
The Kasa & bedrooms are beautifully designed, huge bed, lovely shower, coffee machine & super comfy.
Pool/rooftop bar & food with loungers.
A great breakfast too.
Last but not least, the staff were wonderful, especially Omar.
Could not recommend enough.
😁

title: Cool place”
content: The staff was all incredible.  We went for a music concert.  What an amazing venue. The units are small.  Cute.  Comfortable.  We will return.

title: 우수”
content: Papaya is an amazing place but it is 45 mins walk from the main strip of beach and a 10 min cab drive. Although generally it would take longer because of traffic. What is amazing is that you have the beach to yourself as not many people wander through if they arent actually staying there. It is a special place in Tulum that everyone would know about it. My cabana was a 5 minute walk from reception but insanely beautiful. Tulum is beautiful...

title: 우수”
content: Nice quaint place.  I got the room on sale so it was a good deal. My only complaint is it needs more beach chairs. In the afternoon there was no where to sit on the beach and the beach area is very small.

hotel_name: 프라야 팜스 비치 호텔 (Playa Palms Beach Hotel)
title: Nice rooms, some beach is better than none”
content: Really like the design of the rooms. Beds are comfortable. Staff is friendly. The beach is ok... it's small with seaweed, but at least you can enjoy beach vibes. I'd stay again

hotel_name: 프라야 팜스 비치 호텔 (Playa Palms Beach Hotel)
title: Great accomodation right on the beach and town.”
content: Amazing staff and spacious charming rooms with beautiful balconies. Fantastic beach bistro and restaurants nearby.

hotel_name: 프라야 팜스 비치 호텔 (Playa Palms Beach Hotel)
title: Paradise at Playa del Carmin”
content: Beautiful room and grounds in best location. Reasonable price for fantastic service.

hotel_name: 프라야 팜스 비치 호텔 (Playa Palms Beach Hotel)
title: Beautiful hotel with quiet comfortable room.”
content: Breakfast was not great, they don't have their own bar or restaurant therefore they are using  the neighbour hotel's restaurant which is ok.

hotel_name: 프라야 팜스 비치 호텔 (Playa Palms Beach Hotel)
title: Beautiful hotel on the beach  with lovely sea view”
content:
Loved everything about this place. It was my 5th time in Playa and I stayed in very nice boutique hotels before but this exceeded all my expectations.
Location couldn't be better: just off the quinta avenida on the beach side.. all the rooms have spacious terraces with tables and hammocks which wee great for chilling out in the evening.. the rooms on the beach front are slightly more expensive but they have better sea view than the ones on the back..
it was my sister's birthday and when they heard about this they arranged a nice cake and they decorated the room with baloons and flowers.. a lovely touch!
staff were extremely polite and friendly and this is one of the few hotel in playa which has a pool right on the beach which was very welcome during those days when the sea was a bit rough.. 
overall it was great value for money and I will definitely reccomend it to all my friends and family..

hotel_name: 프라야 팜스 비치 호텔 (Playa Palms Beach Hotel)
title: Good service, okay location”
content: whole the windows were helpful, there are a number of dance clubs around the corner with music blaring until 8am.  the air conditioning barely worked in room 310. the beach is nice, but you cant get in the water as dozens of boats are mored out front. room okay, matress very firm, no restaurant,and continental breakfast was poor, but the restuarant two doors down was excelent. staff were all great!

hotel_name: 프라야 팜스 비치 호텔 (Playa Palms Beach Hotel)
title: 雨季の滞在で残念でした”
content:
４泊しましたが、滞在時間のうち晴れてたのは３０％くらいでした。
ロケーションは悪くないのですが、近くのビーチバーの騒音が朝方（特に土曜日）まで聞こえ残念でした。部屋は十分な広さがあり清潔さも問題なかったです。部屋に持ってきてくれる朝食のクロワッサンが美味でした。またフロントスタッフはとてもフレンドリーでこちらの要望、質問に対応してくれました。

滞在中、かなりの時間雨に降られてしまいました。晴天だったら素晴らしい滞在になったと思います。

hotel_name: 프라야 팜스 비치 호텔 (Playa Palms Beach Hotel)
title: Etape intime et rafraichissante”
content: petit hôtel sur la plage, proche de tout mais à l'abri du brouhaha des bars et de la rue. Les chambres qui donnent sur la piscine et les cocotiers du jardin sont confortables, propres et bien équipées (frigidaire, kitchenette, nespresso...). Petit déjeuner basique servi dans les chambres ou sur la terrasse de chaque chambre. Personnel charmant et réactif. la piscine très propres et particulièrement appréciée en période de sargasses abondantes sur la plage.

hotel_name: 프라야 팜스 비치 호텔 (Playa Palms Beach Hotel)
title: Schönes Hotel an einem verdrecktem Strand”
content:
- Lage top ( sehr zentral)
- Essen Top 
- Personal Top
- Strand ( Meer war dunkel braun, geruch von Kanalisation),  wobei es nicht schlimm war , da man 200-400 meter nach rechts läuft das Meer schöner wird.

Kann man nur empfehlen 👍🏽👍🏽👍🏽

hotel_name: 프라야 팜스 비치 호텔 (Playa Palms Beach Hotel)
title: Stay somewhere else”
content: The place is misleading from the photos. The pool is quite small and there are quite literally no places to sit in the common area, other than the beach. No restaurant or other amenities. Additionally this part of the beach has boats in front so you can’t swim. We ended up moving accommodation and they didn’t give us even a partial credit. Were extremely misled here, especially for the price.

hotel_name: 프라야 팜스 비치 호텔 (Playa Palms Beach Hotel)
title: Hotel boutique bien ubicado, con buen gusto su dis”
content:
Excelente atencion del personal, muy dispuestos a la hora de atender al cliente,muy buena limpieza, comoda cocina para cosas rapidas, muy cerca de la playa y de la 5ta. avenida.
Muy  interesante para manejarse caminando. A pesar del ruido de los boliches, las ventanas muy hermeticas aislaban lo suficiente para dormir tranquilos.

title: 야외수영장이 멋있어요”
content: 일단 위치가 해변과 가깝고 쇼핑하기에도 편리해서 좋아요 룸도 독특하고 침대도 편안해요 야외수영장이 두개나 있고 나무에 둘러쌓여 풍경이 아름다워요 갑자기 물이 안나와서 잠시 힘들었지만 자주 있는 일은 아니라고 하네요 가격대비 너무 괜찮은 곳이예요 직원분은 아주 친절한 분과 보통인분들로 나뉘어요 직원분들이 문신을 많이 하셔서 좀 무섭긴 했어요^^

hotel_name: 라 파시온 호텔 부티크 바이 부니크 (La Pasion Hotel Boutique by Bunik)
title: Playa del Carmen, a little far away from main street”
content:
Pros
Staffs are nice and friendly
It is a little far away from main streets that It is quite

Cons
You should walk from main area for 10 mins.
Room is not so clean, There are some other ppl clothes in a drawer.
Room is small

hotel_name: 라 파시온 호텔 부티크 바이 부니크 (La Pasion Hotel Boutique by Bunik)
title: 야외수영장이 멋있어요”
content: 일단 위치가 해변과 가깝고 쇼핑하기에도 편리해서 좋아요 룸도 독특하고 침대도 편안해요 야외수영장이 두개나 있고 나무에 둘러쌓여 풍경이 아름다워요 갑자기 물이 안나와서 잠시 힘들었지만 자주 있는 일은 아니라고 하네요 가격대비 너무 괜찮은 곳이예요 직원분은 아주 친절한 분과 보통인분들로 나뉘어요 직원분들이 문신을 많이 하셔서 좀 무섭긴 했어요^^

hotel_name: 라 파시온 호텔 부티크 바이 부니크 (La Pasion Hotel Boutique by Bunik)
title: Playa del Carmen, a little far away from main street”
content:
Pros
Staffs are nice and friendly
It is a little far away from main streets that It is quite

Cons
You should walk from main area for 10 mins.
Room is not so clean, There are some other ppl clothes in a drawer.
Room is small

title: Convenient location, great rooftop pool!”
content: The rooms are clean and modern and the rooftop pools are beautiful with a view to the sea. There is a supermarket in the building itself which is super convenient and you are close to restaurants around. There was some construction going on during the day but there was a note about it so maybe check with the hotel before booking. It seems a bit isolated when you first arrive but it is a good bargain.

hotel_name: Viva Maya by Wyndham, A Trademark All Inclusive Resort
title: Birthday week”
content: It’s was good. The staff was very friendly and attentive. The housekeeping ladies were very nice. The hotel it’s self is very basic, the rooms are basic. The pool area too. But it was nice for the time we spent there.

hotel_name: Viva Maya by Wyndham, A Trademark All Inclusive Resort
title: Price Quality HOTEL”
content: Good to stay considering the price paid

hotel_name: Viva Maya by Wyndham, A Trademark All Inclusive Resort
title: Nice place!”
content: We were there for a friends’ wedding, and it a great venue for that. Stayed a week. I’ve never seen more attentive or nicer staff anymore. The only low point was the quality of the food-but that’s common at many Mexican all-inclusive (not excusing it though).

hotel_name: Viva Maya by Wyndham, A Trademark All Inclusive Resort
title: Great for for what you pay for ”
content: If you're looking to enjoy an all-inclusive without having to pay an arm and a leg I do recommend this stay

hotel_name: Viva Maya by Wyndham, A Trademark All Inclusive Resort
title: No hot water or coffee in room ”
content: Repair hot water , no computer or printers available

hotel_name: Viva Maya by Wyndham, A Trademark All Inclusive Resort
title: Disappointed ”
content: Low maintenance, focus more on treating for insects especially for ants. Needs proper air conditioning units knowing Mexico is so freaking hot. I don’t want to sweat outside and in the room as well. Maybe add fans in the rooms. The buffet is disgusting. Proper supervision needed. Guest would use their hands to pick up the food and just stand there and eat. Needs air conditioning or better fans. Change the 2 reservations for restaurants policy because the buffet sucks. Needs to be more toddler friendly. Other than the pool, my 1 yr old didn’t have anything else to do. More activities; this isn’t an adults only resort. Very limited options all around. For it to be my first time in Mexico, staying at Maya was miserable and boring. I shouldn’t have to pay so much extra to enjoy myself. I can jet ski/para sail in the US. So many other hidden fees. When did you ever have to pay to use the safe in a hotel/resort? $2 per day is a rip off. No English channels! Wi-fi is crap. The staff is nice

hotel_name: Viva Maya by Wyndham, A Trademark All Inclusive Resort
title: We are so happy with Agoda and with the resort! Staff so friendly!!! We were impressed!! Great!!!!”
content: The staff was so so helpful and friendly. Everyone said hello to us and helped us with any questions!! We will definitely come back!!

hotel_name: Viva Maya by Wyndham, A Trademark All Inclusive Resort
title: tres agreable à tout point de vue ”
content:
bon hôtel très bien situé avec une magnifique plage privée( très propre)
très grande gamme de restauration diversifiée, excellent buffet petit dej
tout le personnel est agréable et attentif
...point très négatif la chambre mal situé( face au bar piscine) donc bruit énorme, causé par les gens qui boivent beaucoup et ce, tout les jours très tard.
le personnel de réception asser froid, pas souriant, et distant( le point le plus négatif de cet établissement).

hotel_name: Viva Maya by Wyndham, A Trademark All Inclusive Resort
title: A la Carte Restaurant ”
content:
Die à la Carte Restaurant sind absolute Klasse! Romantisch und gemütlich mit leckerem Essen!
Das Personal im gesamten Hotel ist grosse Klasse.

hotel_name: Viva Maya by Wyndham, A Trademark All Inclusive Resort
title: Mittelmässig”
content: Zimmer feucht u kalt, essen sehr mittelmässig, Sauberkeit ok, Personal ok

hotel_name: Viva Maya by Wyndham, A Trademark All Inclusive Resort
title: Excelente hotel”
content:
La mejor playa 
La mejor atención
El bufete le pongo un 8 le falta más variedad 
Excelente atención 😊
Hotel muy seguro

Instalaciones limpias y seguras

hotel_name: Viva Maya by Wyndham, A Trademark All Inclusive Resort
title: Bra hotel men all inclusive gir fabrikk følelse”
content: Skuffende at det ikke var mulig å spise middag på hotellet hvis ikke bestilt bor dagen før.

hotel_name: Viva Maya by Wyndham, A Trademark All Inclusive Resort
title: Hyvät ruuat buffetissa. ”
content:
Pisteitä hyvästä buffetti ruuasta. Näissä ravintoloissa joihin saa varaukset, ruoka ei ole mitään elämää mullistavaa. 

Paikat ja tilat olivat siistit, altaalla hyvin tilaa ja ranta vieressä, joka on todella siisti ja paljon aurinkotuoleja. 

Huoneet ovat jo vanhoja, mutta siistejä ja kaikki toimii. 

Miinusta saa sisäänkirjautuminen. Se on aivan järkyttävän hidasta. 20 minuuttia per huone menee ja hirveästi kaikkia turhia lappuja täytellä. Ihan surkeaa toimintaa.  Vain  yksi ihminen tiskillä ja ihmisillä meni ihan järki siinä odotella. 

Altaan drinkit on kyllä niin mietoja ja alkoholi pulloissa ei ole sitä mitä niissä lukee ja nekin on lantrattuja. Itselle ei niin tärkeää ollut alkoholi, mutta muutaman tilasin ja totesin että parempi ottaa vaikka olut tai limppari. Palvelu baarissa oikein hyvää. Samalla alueella myös 24h snack baari ja siinäkin hyvät välipalat.

hotel_name: Viva Maya by Wyndham, A Trademark All Inclusive Resort
title: Betaalbare all inclusive resort ”
content: Goed eten en drinken. Aan t strand! Fijn en veilige omgeving.

hotel_name: Viva Maya by Wyndham, A Trademark All Inclusive Resort
title: Цена , Качество”
content: Отличный отель , удачное расположение. Сервис на пять. Рекомендую.

hotel_name: 호텔 HM 플라야 델 카르멘 (Hotel HM Playa del Carmen)
title: 위치가 너무 좋아요”
content:
칸쿤에 가면 보통 고급 올인클루시브 에 많이
머무르는데 .. 스칼렛에서 하얏트 로 넘어 가기전 
플라야델카르만 을 느껴 보고 싶어 2일
머무른 숙소인데 위치가 너무 좋고 멕시코 여행중 잊지 못할 2일이었습니다

hotel_name: 호텔 HM 플라야 델 카르멘 (Hotel HM Playa del Carmen)

가성비 최고에요
가겨대비 너무 좋은 시설을 갖추고있어요
잘 찾아간거같아 대만족이에요

hotel_name: 더 리프 28 - 성인 전용, 올 스위트, 미식 옵션 올인클루시브 (The Reef 28, Adults Only, All Suites, Optional Gourmet All Inclusive)
title: Be prepared for NOISE!”
content:
Love this hotel and have stayed 3 times now. Lots of positives - the rooftop pool & staff up there (Brenda & Freddy) are a highlight along with the Mexican restaurant & lobby bar. Close proximity to walk to everything in Playa including the beach. Fantastic views from the rooftop too.

Be prepared for minimal sleep as this is a very noisy hotel & it should be disclosed at the time of booking. There are bars & clubs on every side that will keep you awake until around 1AM every night - room 3303 was terrible for noise.

Air con doesn’t work properly & temperature doesn’t drop even when you change the settings which makes it hard to sleep in the heat. Otherwise the rooms are great with heaps of space.

Check in staff are a bit vague & unhelpful but all other staff were fantastic and made our stay very enjoyable.

hotel_name: 더 리프 28 - 성인 전용, 올 스위트, 미식 옵션 올인클루시브 (The Reef 28, Adults Only, All Suites, Optional Gourmet All Inclusive)

title: 최고”
content: 더 좋을 수 없었다.

title: 깨끗하고 조용한 위치”
content: 이 호텔을 좋아하고 3 번 머물렀습니다. 현대적이고 넓고 기능적이며 좋은 위치에 있으며, 무엇보다도 다운타운 플라야의 호텔 중에서는 조용합니다. 서비스는 항상 훌륭합니다. 직원들은 친절하고 도움이됩니다. 가격 대비 우수합니다. 플라야에 머무를 때 올인클루시브가 아닌 숙박시 내 첫 번째 선택입니다.

title: 숨겨진 보석! 최고!”
content: 도착했을 때 방이 사용 불가능했지만 무료로 더 크고 좋은 방으로 업그레이드해 주었습니다. 방 안에는 우리를 환영하는 개인화된 편지가 있었습니다. 방 안은 아름다웠고, 세면도구부터 헤어 드라이어, 주방 용품까지 빠지는 것이 없었습니다. 직원들은 매우 예의 바르고 도움이 되었으며, 요리를 하려고 할 때는 조금의 기름까지도 제공해 주었습니다. 옥상 수영장은 훌륭하고 전망도 아주 좋았습니다. 해변 바로 옆은 아니지만 바다를 볼 수 있습니다. 주니어 스위트에 머무르고 있는데, 가격에 비해 매우 가치가 있으며 서비스도 AAA라고 할 수 있었습니다. 프런트 데스크에는 안나 알론다, 레스토랑에는 아르만도가 있습니다. 그게 바로 당신의 AAA입니다. 아침 식사는 좋았고, 커피를 추가로 채워주었습니다. 다른 호텔에서는 아침 식사 포함이라도 한 잔만 마실 수 있다고 말려고 했던 적이 있었는데, 여기에서는 그런 일이 없었습니다. 갑자기 나타나는 추가 요금이나 청구는 없었으며, 이는 칸쿤에서 흔한 일입니다. 솔직히 말해서, 그들은 서비스를 최우선으로 생각하고 있으며, 많은 호텔 소유자들에게 무언가를 가르칠 수 있을 것입니다.

title: 일류 고객 서비스”
content: 고객 서비스가 우수한 훌륭한 호텔

title: 아름다운, 깨끗하고 넓은 방”
content: 온라인 사진이 정확합니다. 방은 아름답고 깨끗합니다. 친절한 직원, 간단하지만 고품질 음식인 아침 식사. 옥상 수영장에서의 전망은 괜찮습니다. 멀리 떨어져 있지만 여전히 볼만합니다. 침실은 Playa에서 찾기 어려운 거리 소음으로부터 절연되어 있습니다. 몇 가지 단점이 있습니다. 윗층 유닛에서 의자를 끌면 바닥을 긁는 소리가 들립니다. 의자 다리에 펠트 패드를 놓으면 바닥을 긁히지 않으므로 간단한 해결책입니다. 욕실 수건은 얇고 찢어졌습니다. 수영장 선쉐이드는 싼 가격이며 강한 바람에 견딜 수 없습니다. 단점이 있더라도 다시 여기에 머무르고 싶습니다.

title: Great place”
content: Good place. Would stay again.

title: No comfort ”
content:
The best thing in this hotel are : the staff and very clean .
The breakfast very limited poor and stingy , always you have to eat other breakfast outside . 
Beds : the worst ever very small twin size and uncomfortable, every day I wake up with back pain and exhausted . 
Honestly . There so much better options in playa del Carmen and so much cheaper and so much better than serenity .

title: 최고”
content: Very good

title: Not as advertised.”
content: Very sad that this hotel was not as advertised. No bar, limited restaurant, lots of surrounding construction. We left and moved to the Thompson Main House which was FABULOUS.

title: Not great ”
content: The hotel room is exactly as picture in the photos so that’s great, but that’s pretty much it. The staff charged us a hidden tax ( Agoda called the hotel because it’s their responsibility to inform us if there will be and they didn’t take responsibility), we requested prices for COVID tests and they never got back to us. The hotel is a bit far from all the clubs and nightlife, the pool is quite depressing , at night there is a doorman and not proper security. The best thing of the hotel is the room service, worth ordering

title: Bon hotel”
content: Bien placé , très propre , calme mais le petit dej compris dans les nuitées ne sont pas du tout intéressant. Tout est fait pour acheter en plus .

title: 최고”
content: Funcionários muito atenciosos e prestativos. Local limpo, bonito, confortável e bem localizado.

title: Molto spazio e comodità ”
content: Appartamento con camera da letto e soggiorno  con cucina separati, grande spazio fresco modernamente allestito e dotato di tutte le comodità. Unico neo: Non hanno cambiato gli asciugamani per tre giorni.

title: Mooie luxe gevoel”
content: Voelt als thuiskomen in de suite met separate slaapkamer en aangrenzende badkamer.  Mooie woonkamer met open keuken en lekker terras!

title: Kwaliteit”
content: We zouden officieel 1 dag blijven slapen in dit hotel, maar we bleven toch drie dagen. De bed is superfijn! De hotel is schoon en mooi. Op de 5de verdieping hebben ze een zwembad. enige minpuntje is dat er geen drinken en eten te krijgen is bij de zwembad.

title: מלון בוטיק טוב ונקי”
content:
מלון בוטיק עם מגוון חדרים, אל תקחו את חדר הסטדיו כי אין בו מרפסת או אוורור חיצוני רק חלון אחד למסדרון. שאר החדרים, היינו בשתיים,  הם דירות עם סלון מרפסת מטבח מקלחת ופינת אוכל.
הנקיון ממש טוב ונעים, ארוחת הבוקר סבבה
ובפלאיה מצאנו שזה מיקום מצויין ונעים ליד כל מה שהיינו צריכים.

מלון בוטיק עם מגוון חדרים, אל תקחו את חדר הסטדיו כי אין בו מרפסת או אוורור חיצוני רק חלון אחד למסדרון. שאר החדרים, היינו בשתיים,  הם דירות עם סלון מרפסת מטבח מקלחת ופינת אוכל.
הנקיון ממש טוב ונעים, ארוחת הבוקר סבבה
ובפלאיה מצאנו שזה מיקום מצויין ונעים ליד כל מה שהיינו צריכים.

title: 가성비  훌륭해요”
content: 플라야델 카르멘에서 이만한 호텔 찾기 쉽지 않은듯 액티비티 갈때 쓸만한 호텔 없는건 가격생각하면 훌륭함 루프탑 수영장 좋음

title: 허니문”
content:
액티비티와 여행자 거리를 느끼기 좋은 위치 최고의 숙소
공항버스 내리는곳과도 굉장히 가깝고 액티비티 갈때 빼고 모든곳을 걸어다니며 관광했다. 
맛있는 로컬 음식과 맥시코 분위기를 느끼기 좋은 곳

title: 가성비가 좋은 호텔입니다.”
